sentence.Network_en: Building the model railroad was a laboro flove for the retired engineer.
sentence.Network_cn: 建造这铁路模型封那位退休工程师而言是欢喜情愿做的工作.

list.abs: Ro-do laboro work工作劳动来自日语回复吧友218.9.114.* 世界语词: che at che在 de of de的 e ni us al ni给我们 En in en在内 Igi igi become.
